name: Sweet Digs
description:
You're a Quokka, at home in your borrow with your collection of fancy hats. But the humans have found out how adorable you are, and attracting them means that your environment is getting wrecked! Escape to find a new home, but home is where your stuff is, so try to bring along as many of your wonderful hats as you can. Your score is based on the amount of the hats you managed to keep with you before you reach the end or fail.

Controls

WASD - Move. Moving over a hat will pick it up but you can only wear one at a time.
E - Drop your hat into the tile below you (the tile must be empty)
P - End the current game and submit your score

Hi scores shown online!

Credits
